Text:
[SoN], please please please crack the final 12.5.38 release of OOTP.

Also if you could some way crack Front Office Football 2007, that would be amazing.

Would it be possible to get the update? The game is rather unplayable being that after the 3rd year hiring gets stuck in an infinite loop.

Then you have to go manually hire for all 300 teams :| kinda sucks.
